trans-unit.source: The install tool has been locked

For security reasons, the install tool has been locked after a wrong password had been entered more than three times in a row. To unlock it, open the local configuration file and set installCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: Per motivs da segirezza è l'utensil d'installaziun vegnì bloccà, suenter ch'in fauss pled-clav è vegnì endatà dapli che trais giadas ina suenter l'autra. Per debloccar el stos ti avrir la datoteca da configuraziun locala e tschentar installCount sin 0.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the install tool password. The install tool password is not the same as the Contao back end password.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il pled-clav da l'utensil d'installaziun. Il pled-clav da l'utensil d'installaziun na correspunda betg al pled-clav per il back-end.

trans-unit.source: To additionally secure the Contao install tool, you can either rename or completely remove the contao/install.php file.
trans-unit.target: Per anc dapli segirezza per Contao pos ti era renumnar u stizzar la datoteca contao/install.php suenter l'installaziun.

trans-unit.source: This key is used to store encrypted data. Please note that encrypted data can only be decrypted with this key! Therefore note it down and do not change it if there is encrypted data already. Leave empty to generate a random key.
trans-unit.target: La clav vegn utilisada per memorisar datas a moda criptada. Attenziun: Datas criptadas pon be vegnir restauradas cun questa clav! La notescha insanua e na la mida betg sch'i existan gia datas criptadas. Lascha vid quest champ per crear ina clav casuala.
Colliaziun a la banca da datas

trans-unit.source: Please enter your database connection parameters.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha sutvart las datas d'access per la banca da datas.

trans-unit.source: For more information see the MySQL manual.
trans-unit.target: Legia il manual da MySQL per retschaiver ulteriuras infurmaziuns.

trans-unit.source: Please note that the update assistant has only been tested with MySQL and MySQLi drivers. If you are using a different database (e.g. Oracle), you might have to install or update your database manually.
trans-unit.target: Fa attenziun che l'assistent d'actualisar è be vegnì testà per drivers da MySQL e MySQLi. Sche ti utiliseschas ina autra banca da datas (p. ex. Oracle) stos ti eventualmain installar u actualisar manualmain tia banca da datas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can import an .sql file from the templates directory with a pre-configured example website. Existing data will be deleted! If you only want to import a theme, please use the theme manager in the Contao back end instead.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti importar ina datoteca .sql ord l'ordinatur templates cun ina pagina d'internet pre-configurada. Per far quai vegnan tut las datas existentas stizzadas! Sche ti vuls be importar in theme, utilisescha p. pl. l'administraziun da themes en il back-end da Contao.

trans-unit.source: If you have imported the example website, the admin's username is k.jones and the password is kevinjones. See the example website (front end) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Sche ti has importà la pagina d'internet d'exempel è il num d'utilisader k.jonesed il pled-clav kevinjones. Chargia la pagina d'exempel (front-end) per retschaiver ulteriuras infurmaziuns.

trans-unit.source: Now please log into the Contao back end and check the system settings. Then visit your website to make sure that Contao is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: S'annunzia ussa en il back-end da Contao e controllescha la configuraziun dal sistem. Visita lura tia pagina d'internet per controllar che Contao funcziunescha correctamain.

trans-unit.source: Your server does not support file access via PHP; most likely PHP runs as Apache module under a different user. Therefore please enter your FTP login details, so Contao can modify files via FTP (Safe Mode Hack).
trans-unit.target: Tes server na sustegna betg l'access a datas via PHP; probabel vegn PHP exequì sco modul d'Apache sut in auter utilisader. Endatescha p. pl. tias datas d'access dad FTP, per che Contao po modifitgar las datas via FTP (Safe Mode Hack).
S'annunziar en il back-end da Contao

trans-unit.source: Please enter a password to prevent unauthorized access!
trans-unit.target: Endatescha in pled-clav per impedir che persunas nunautorisadas han access!

trans-unit.source: A custom password has been set.
trans-unit.target: In pled-clav individual è vegnì deponì.

trans-unit.source: An encryption key has to be at least 12 characters long!
trans-unit.target: La clav sto cuntegnair almain 12 caracters!

trans-unit.source: An encryption key has been created.

trans-unit.target: Connectà a la banca da datas.
Nagina connexiun ad ina banca da datas.
Memorisar la configuraziun da la banca da datas

trans-unit.source: Changing the collation will affect all tables with a tl_ prefix.
trans-unit.target: Midar la collaziun pertutga tut las tabellas cun il prefix tl_.

trans-unit.source: The database is not up to date!
trans-unit.target: La banca da datas n'è betg actuala!

trans-unit.source: The database is up to date.
trans-unit.target: La banca da datas è actuala.

trans-unit.source: It seems that you are upgrading from a Contao version prior to version %s. If that is the case, it is required to run the version %s update to ensure the integrity of your data!
trans-unit.target: I para che ti fas ina actualisaziun dad ina versiun da Contao pli pitschna che %s. Sche quai è correct èsi exnum necessari dad actualisar l'emprim a la versiun %s per garantir l'integritad da las Datas!

trans-unit.source: The import failed! Is the database structure up to date and is the template file compatible with your Contao version?
trans-unit.target: Errur durant l'import! È la sturctura da la banca da datas actuala ed è la datoteca da template cumpatibla cun tia versiun da Contao?
Tscherna p. pl. ina datoteca da template!

trans-unit.source: Any existing data will be deleted!
trans-unit.target: Tut las datas existentas vegnan stizzadas!

trans-unit.source: Any existing data will be deleted! Do you really want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Tut las datas existentas vegnan stizzadas. Tuttina cuntinuar?

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all fields to create an admin user!
trans-unit.target: Emplenescha tut ils champs per crear in conto d'administratur.

trans-unit.source: An admin user has been created.
trans-unit.target: In conto d'administratur è vegnì creà.
Ti has installà Contao cun success
Decurs relativ a l'ordinatur da Contao (p. ex. httpdocs/)

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to FTP server %s
trans-unit.target: Impussibel da connectar al server FTP %s.
L'ordinatur da Contao %s n'è betg vegnì chattà

trans-unit.source: The configured files directory does not exist!
trans-unit.target: L'ordinatur da datotecas configurà n'exista betg!

trans-unit.source: Did you rename the tl_files folder to files? You cannot just rename the folder, because all the file references in the database and your style sheets will still point to the old location. If you want to rename the folder, please do so after the version 3 update and make sure to adjust your database data with the following script: %s.
trans-unit.target: Has ti renumnà l'ordinatur tl_files a files? Ti na pos betg simplamain renumnar l'ordinatur perquai che tut las referenzas a datotecas en la banca da datas ed en tes stylesheets mussan sin il num vegl. Sche ti vuls renumnar l'ordinatur, fai quai suenter l'actualisaziun sin versiun 3 e controllescha che ti adatteschas las datas da la banca da datas cun suandant script: %s.
